Magic Items.name: Magic Items
Magic Items.text:
@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.1q2PqC5KtxXjoUwL]{Haemscale Armour}

@embed[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.1q2PqC5KtxXjoUwL inline]{Haemscale Breastplate (Uncommon)}

Rare variant: While you wear this armour, you have resistance to cold damage. Increase Arcanomagnetic Repulsion’s Aura to a 30-foot radius. The item gains the Superconductor property.

  • Superconductor. Whenever you take cold damage while you wear this armour, you gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of your next turn.

Legendary variant: While you wear this armour, you have resistance to cold damage. Increase Arcanomagnetic Repulsion’s Aura to a 40-foot radius, and Superconductor’s flying speed to 40 feet. The item gains the Superconductor and Swordstorm properties.

  • Swordstorm. As an action, you can cast the blade barrier spell (save DC 17), adding any ferrous objects in the vicinity to the barrier. At the GM’s discretion, if there are many ferrous objects in the area, increase the barrier’s damage by 2d10. Once you activate this property, you can’t do so again until the following dawn.

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.1q2PqC5KtxXjoUwL]{Haemscale Breastplate (Uncommon)}

@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.jJdN0TnJvLrdVmXl]{Haemstrike Hammer }

@embed[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.jJdN0TnJvLrdVmXl inline]{Haemstrike Light Hammer (Uncommon)}

Rare variant: The weapon has a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. If the target is made of ferrous metal or is wearing ferrous armour, increase the bonus to +3. Increase the DC to 15, the maximum weight of a target object to 600 pounds, and the size at which a target creature automatically succeeds on its check to Huge or larger. The weapon gains the Magnetic Shockwave optional attunement property.

  • OA: Magnetic Shockwave. Once per turn when you hit a target with haemstrike, you can cause an eruption of supercooled magnetite shards. Each creature other than you within 5 feet of the target must succeed on a [[/save dex 15]] , taking [[/damage 1d6 cold & 1d6 piercing average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a success. Creatures made of ferrous metal or wearing ferrous armour have &reference[disadvantage]{disadvantage} on this saving throw.

Very rare variant: The weapon has a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. If the target is made of ferrous metal or is wearing ferrous armour, increase the bonus to +3. Increase the DC to 16, the maximum weight of a target object to 1000 pounds, and the size at which a target creature automatically succeeds on its check to Gargantuan or larger. The weapon gains the Dragon’s Roar and Magnetic Shockwave optional attunement properties.

  • OA: Dragon's Roar. While holding haemstrike, you can use a bonus action to make it release an intimidating roar. Each creature other than you within 15 feet of you must succeed on a [[/save wis 16 format=long]] or become &reference[frightened]{frightened} of you until the end of your next turn.

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.jJdN0TnJvLrdVmXl]{Haemstrike Light Hammer (Uncommon)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.1PduNbGACwIcpXZW]{Haemstrike Light Hammer (Rare)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.e4sCXSBJbBs850cx]{Haemstrike Light Hammer (Very Rare)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.RKcrGkx1XYsZihwi]{Haemstrike Maul (Uncommon)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.X35OzEHFkHzteB03]{Haemstrike Maul (Rare)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.WUtGvyHD5HBzbzZF]{Haemstrike Maul (Very Rare)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.PHtEZnbwhGkF8bY2]{Haemstrike Warhammer (Uncommon)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.8O5T7DXE3aXZN0Nd]{Haemstrike Warhammer (Rare)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.dcKr76Hvox3S4LUp]{Haemstrike Warhammer (Very Rare)}

@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.NFob5URZyJOZqvfA]{Shard Crown}

@embed[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.NFob5URZyJOZqvfA inline]{Shard Crown (Rare)}

Very rare variant: Increase the attack modifier to +8, the number of charges to 8, the recharge to [[/r 1d4 + 4]], and the DC to 16. While you wear this crown in extreme cold, you can cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.yfbK8gZqESlaoY5t]{Fly} spell on yourself at will. The item gains the Magnetovision property.

  • Magnetovision. As a bonus action, you can expend 1 charge allowing you to sense the locations of all ferrous metals within 60 feet of you for the next 10 minutes. This vision is blocked by a thin sheet of lead.

Legendary variant: Increase the attack modifier to [[/attack 9]], the number of charges to 12, the recharge to [[/r 1d8 + 4]], and the DC to 17. While you wear this crown in extreme cold, you can cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.yfbK8gZqESlaoY5t]{Fly} spell on yourself at will. The item gains the Magnetovision and Crown of Shards properties.

  • Crown of Shards. As a bonus action, you can spend 1 charge to shoot a shard of magnetite at a target within 90 feet of you. Make a ranged spell attack ([[/attack +9]] to hit), which deals [[/damage 4d6 piercing average]] damage on a hit. This shard can bend around corners and ignores half and three-quarters cover.

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.NFob5URZyJOZqvfA]{Shard Crown (Rare)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.hfw2bJmVlvhdw7ch]{Shard Crown (Very Rare)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.GCopiV4snVEk6J6b]{Shard Crown (Legendary)}

@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.7QN8Fxbm3y8HkOne]{Snow Wolf Cowl}

@embed[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.7QN8Fxbm3y8HkOne inline]{Snow Wolf Cowl (Uncommon)}

Uncommon variant: When you use the Wolf Form property, you turn into a dire wolf instead of a winter wolf.

Very rare variant: Increase the attack modifier for your attacks in wolf form to [[/attack +9]], the DC of your Cold Breath and Bite actions to 16, and your hit points in wolf form to 100. You have &reference[resistance]{resistance} to cold damage while you wear the cowl.

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.7QN8Fxbm3y8HkOne]{Snow Wolf Cowl (Uncommon)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.zuVAyKVcAWJhsdeT]{Snow Wolf Cowl (Very Rare)}
